website_summaries.verdict: If you're looking for an infrared thermometer for your home and  are willing to pay a mid-range price, this is a sound choice.
pros: Vivid digital LCD with HD backlight is easy to read
Accurate and ideal for home use
Comes with a holster and battery
cons: otherwise, there are few complaints about this solid tool

customer_reviews.title: Ok for food,  great for relationship
customer_reviews.text: We use this regularly for grilling, but my husband will occasionally aim it at my chest and exclaim loudly, "yep, my wife is still hot!"
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good for the price, my unit is outside of the rated accuracy at a deviation of +-4.5 F as checked against a thermocouple and a high-end handheld infrared unit. The LCD is a nice touch but the laser diffuser is my favorite element of the unit as it provides a very accurate visual reference to the measurement cone.
customer_reviews.author: Jackson C.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to see.
customer_reviews.text: Update January 2020. I have been making an effort to go back and review items that have particularly impressed me or surprised me by their longevity. I just used this thermometer last week to look for hotspots after installing a gas heater in my garage. I have owned this for more than three years and it still works fine. I may have had to change the battery once. Original review July 2017. This thermometer takes very quick readings, I also like the display. I am visually impaired and the dark background with bright text makes this easy to read.
customer_reviews.author: Tom & Emily

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking colored display, at first the laser wouldn't activate, gave a reading but obviously was useless without the laser. After fiddling with the buttons it came on. Don't know how accurate it is, gave it away as a gift to my nephew before I could test it against other units I have. Feels extremely light and cheap, don't like the odds of it surviving any falls.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse James

customer_reviews.title: Works great easy to read
customer_reviews.text: this thermometer works great. I use it to get a temp reading on my wood fired outdoor oven. it works well and is easy to read even in low light - the color display is the tops! While I do get out of limit readings sometime on the bricks on the top of the oven that because they're up around 1200 degrees. I take a few readings on the sides back and top and that give a pretty good picture of what the actual oven temperature is. I would buy this again and do recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Grant Rees

customer_reviews.title: Worked for a year
customer_reviews.text: Removed the unit from inside the house to check on the temp of my metal roof of the storage house. Unit display was blinking and indicated a low battery so I placed a new battery in the unit and set it down to get something from the house. When I returned, I could see smoke coming from the unit and it was hot to the touch. I removed the battery and placed it outside in case it would possibly ignite. It’s now toast.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tool and fun as well.
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Its very accurate. Also has been the source of many laughs etc with the kids. The dog loves chasing the laser. But even with all the actual fun you can have shooting it in your ears? It is a very capable tool. I use it mostly for engine work.
customer_reviews.author: BTC Dawn C

customer_reviews.title: Simple, accurate, user friendly
customer_reviews.text: I got this to check the calibration of my analog temp gauges on my smokers. It works great. Very easy to use right out of the box. The controls are user friendly. Accuracy is spot on versus other temp gauges.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Bustamante

customer_reviews.title: Vibrant easy to read display and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I really like this thermometer. The display pops and is super easy to read.
customer_reviews.author: D. Skye

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: Been wanting this for a while, especially I work as a handy person. Doing a lot of work that need to check the temperature. By this my work gets so easy. Easy to use and works good. Lots of use and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Harry

customer_reviews.title: Very useful
customer_reviews.text: Very useful for checking temps at the registers in the house. Or just checking the temp in the house. I have checked outside temps also and the unit is accurate. My wife has a ball with it. She's been checking the temps of everything she can.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: This reads 17.5 degrees cold total POS don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.author: toddinnv

customer_reviews.title: Worked one time.
customer_reviews.text: Only worked the one time when I was looking for hot fluorescent fixtures. A year later (second use)it didn't work. All I got were negative readings. Buy a fluke brand.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: This is fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Instant and accurate surface readings. I use it on cast iron and for griddle cooking. It's awesome.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves it
customer_reviews.text: It's more complicated than it looks, has lots of features and instructions to go with it too. Not bulky, easy to handle, well worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... very well as far as I can tell very easy to read screen
customer_reviews.text: Works very well as far as I can tell very easy to read screen.
customer_reviews.author: Mk

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Way too complicated for what I wanted but a good piece of equipment for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Goetz

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Operate, User Friendly
customer_reviews.text: Long lasting and very accurate readings on Temperature. User friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Mr LG Detail & Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Good tool
customer_reviews.text: Works well and has been helpful in roof deck insulating
customer_reviews.author: roberta peck

customer_reviews.title: If it works!
customer_reviews.text: I bought as a gift to my husband. I won't give it to him until Christmas so I really can't rate the features.
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: Best for cooking!
customer_reviews.text: Great cooking infrared thermometer. I ised it daily to check the temps in my wood fired oven. Works like a charm and is very accurate. You can custom calibrate the temperature settings as well.
customer_reviews.author: Woodfired Tone

customer_reviews.title: Ohhhhh, pretty lights
customer_reviews.text: I like the cone effect of the laser. Lots of people seem to think that these things use the laser as the temp sensor and that is not the case. It's a cone that comes out and this shows you exactly the area being tested.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Sorry product
customer_reviews.text: Would not change from c to f on temperature range
customer_reviews.author: bob privett

customer_reviews.title: Looks are decieveing
customer_reviews.text: Thought it would be decent quality , but it's pretty much a toy
customer_reviews.author: equinerider88

customer_reviews.title: Nice to have on grill day
customer_reviews.text: Well packaged, light weight but the instructions and explanations are weak. Nice to have on grill day!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: used like crazy times
customer_reviews.text: I use it to make steaks and other cooking needs. LOVE it. Easy, beautiful, practical, and well built. i am a happy bunny ..
customer_reviews.author: sat

customer_reviews.title: Easy to read color screen
customer_reviews.text: Easy to read color screen. I've pinpointed several areas that needed more insulation in the walls of my home. I also use to check temperatures of oven, frig, grill, frying pan. Seems very accurate when tested to home thermostat and cooking thermometers. Can damage eyes if rays hit them directly so store safely away from children. Unit comes with "holster" type cover. It's lightweigh but durable and fits comfortably in your hand.
customer_reviews.author: Linda L.

customer_reviews.title: it is not super accurate
customer_reviews.text: We have had issues of it being hot on the bottom of the frig while the top is cold then redo the testing and everything is different,... better to spend a lot less and get normal thermometers for every deli case.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley A Plotnikov

customer_reviews.title: she was very happy to have it to test the tires
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased for our daughter who pulls a horse trailer. When she used it, she was very happy to have it to test the tires. She has had some blowouts from defective tires and this is the reason it was purchased for her.
customer_reviews.author: Marvin S.

customer_reviews.title: Ok I guess
customer_reviews.text: The “aim” of the pointer is pretty far off and I am not sure I trust what is says. As is usual for a NC temp sensor, it will not measure shiny metal surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: DLC

customer_reviews.title: It works exactly as I was hoping. Just point ...
customer_reviews.text: It works exactly as I was hoping. Just point it at a surface and you get the temperature very quickly. We have in-floor heating so I wanted to be able to check the temp. at several locations througout the house. This tool has been very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffreyzheng2017

customer_reviews.title: Arrived, did not work
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, but despite a sticker on it saying it "passed QC" it did not work. Returned it for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: D. G. Florida

customer_reviews.title: You get what’s advertised, accurate and easy
customer_reviews.text: Don’t dislike anything so far. Seems well made; accurate and easy to use! I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael F. Hammell

customer_reviews.title: This tool is a must
customer_reviews.text: Customers wonder why I sweat in their attic so I "shoot" the temperature and show them along with my advice.....get your attic ventilated. It will save your utility dollars and extend the life of your air conditioner. This is a must tool for guys like me.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff G.

customer_reviews.title: I think that it is okay
customer_reviews.text: not accurate I made an error confusing this one with one that I bought earlier. The Estink PM6530B seems to be reliable for my around the home use.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Blue Ridge

customer_reviews.title: Versatile thermometer
customer_reviews.text: IR thermometer is so handy — useful for any surface
customer_reviews.author: Ann Onymous

customer_reviews.title: If you're used to cheaper IR thermometers, you don't ...
customer_reviews.text: If you're used to cheaper IR thermometers, you don't realize what you're missing without the circle..... until you get one and realize you can't live without it.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if it is really a useful product
customer_reviews.text: I think it only takes the outside temperature of what you aim it at
customer_reviews.author: Jilda

customer_reviews.title: design is nice and display is great
customer_reviews.text: Not your thermometer if you’re looking for accuracy, I bought it for working with chocolate and the temperatures are close but at least 3 degrees C (37F) off, so I had to return it, design is nice and display is great.
customer_reviews.author: Client d'Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Menu a pain, can't read outside on a sunny day
customer_reviews.text: Not very happy with this product. Temp seems to jump around and the menu can be confusing.
customer_reviews.author: Theron211

customer_reviews.title: Superb value - fast measurement
customer_reviews.text: Nice and compact IR temperature reader. The laser targeting just makes pointing it too easy. Fast measurement capture. A superb value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: EMC Engineer

customer_reviews.title: happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: nice, seems to work well, used it to find cold spots around doors and window frames
customer_reviews.author: Biggs

customer_reviews.title: Great IR thermometer
customer_reviews.text: Great IR thermometer. Seems to be very accurate as long as you set the reflectivity correctly for object being measured.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Reed

customer_reviews.title: but overall the quality is good.
customer_reviews.text: It's a little finicky, not as precise as the laser dot circle implies, but overall the quality is good.
customer_reviews.author: dammitcoetzee

customer_reviews.title: A well made IR nfrared Digital laser reads my a/c ...
customer_reviews.text: A well made IR nfrared Digital laser reads my a/c output. I use it in my house and travel trailers.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Love it......Five stars
customer_reviews.text: Really nice product that works perfectly!!! Well built and so handy....love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for checking grill temperatures.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to check grill temps. It works well for what I use it for. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product it's alot better than I expected it to be
customer_reviews.author: Jason Hunt

customer_reviews.title: great tool for BBQ
customer_reviews.text: I can track my grill temperatures very accurately now, great tool for BBQ!
customer_reviews.author: erlien

customer_reviews.title: Will use professionally at shop, fun at home.
customer_reviews.text: Simple operation, seems to have expected weight and grip. I'm happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Yuri

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Have used in engine room and so far does what it's supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: ANGARI Foundation

customer_reviews.title: The case is also a good touch.
customer_reviews.text: Very accurate and handy. The case is also a good touch.
customer_reviews.author: Julian M.

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my husband to use when BBQing. ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband to use when BBQing. The description of this thermometer says it can be used when cooking, to test the internal temperature of food. It can not. It has many other uses as other reviewers have stated, but it shouldn't advertise itself as being able to do something it can't. We will be returning it. False advertising, Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: PygoraMom

product_meta.title: Infrared Thermometer Non-Contact Digital Laser IR Temperature Gun for Kitchen Meat Food Cooking BBQ Automotive Industrial Thermostat with Flashlight HD Backlight LCD Temp Display
product_meta.description:
Estink ES6530B is a non-contact infrared thermometer that allows you to measure the temperature of an object from a distance by sensing its radiated infrared energy
It has countless usages including cooking, barbequing, making chocolate/Pizza, home repair, automotive and industrial and so on

Features:
1.Built-in 12 laser points surrounding a circle to accurately measure the object, won’t be disturbed by surrounding objects
2.Measure surface temperatures between -58℉-1022℉with an accuracy of ± 1.5% whichever is more accurate than others
3.Auto setting different Min, Max temperature value when testing different objects; The green/red light indicator will remind you if temperature has exceed the maximum value
4.Adjustable emissivity provides increased accuracy for different materials
5.Powerful button function that allow u set backlight screen on/off/℃/℉/laser point on/off and Emissivity

Specifications:
Emissivity: 0.1~1.0
Distance Spot Ratio: 12:1
Laser target pointer: Circle
Response Time: <0.5 second
Dimensions: 6.4 x 3.8 x 1.3’’
Power: 2* AAA Batteries (Included)
Accuracy: ± 1.5% reading+2°C/3.5°F
IRT Temperature: -50°C~550°C/-58°F~1022°F
Features: Data retention, Backlight, Auto shutdown, Low battery/Temperature Bridge Alarm, Flashlight

Package:
2* AAA Battery
1* User Manual
1* Temperature Gun
feature_bullets: More Accurate: With built in 12 laser pointers to accurately aim at, non-contact digital laser thermometer only need 0.5s to accurately measure temperature of the target at greater distances; D:S=12:1. Infrared Thermometer could adjust emissivity and set alarm max

HD LCD Display: Clearer and bigger data display makes this ir laser thermometer gun outstanding, especially in the dark; Also has UV light which can be turned on and off independently; Auto power-off activates after 25s of none work

Temperature Bridge Alarm: The indication of temperature gun turns red when the measured temperature exceeds the set range, which could easily detect if the set temperature is reached or exceeded; Support Degrees Celsius and Fahrenheit (Battery is includeded)

Wide Temperature Range: Infrared thermometer accurately test the temperature during -58℉ - 1022℉ (-50℃ to 550℃); Accurately and quickly measures surface temperatures, ambient temperature and dew point temperature without contacting

Versatile Use: The infrared thermometer can be used for cooking, home cooling, measuring heating food, barbecue, car repair, home maintenance and repair, or other household tasks. PLEASE NOTE: This thermometer is NOT used to measure body temperature. PLEASE read the website description clearly before purchase.
